effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.
